Package org.example.lab.agh.model_package

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
org.example.lab.agh.model_package.Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
Represents a hotel with a specified name, number of floors, and number of rooms per floor. Manages a collection of rooms.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Hotel(String hotelName, int floorNumber, int roomsPerFloor)
    Constructs a Hotel instance with the specified name, number of floors, and number of rooms per floor.
    Hotel(String hotelName, int floorNumber, int roomsPerFloor, MyMap<Integer,Room> roomsMap)
    Constructs a Hotel instance with the specified name, number of floors, number of rooms per floor, and a predefined map of rooms.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hotel

      public Hotel(String hotelName, int floorNumber, int roomsPerFloor)
      Constructs a Hotel instance with the specified name, number of floors, and number of rooms per floor. Initializes an empty map of rooms.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel
      floorNumber - the number of floors in the hotel
      roomsPerFloor - the number of rooms per floor in the hotel

    • Hotel

      public Hotel(String hotelName, int floorNumber, int roomsPerFloor, MyMap<Integer,Room> roomsMap)
      Constructs a Hotel instance with the specified name, number of floors, number of rooms per floor, and a predefined map of rooms.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel
      floorNumber - the number of floors in the hotel
      roomsPerFloor - the number of rooms per floor in the hotel
      roomsMap - a map containing the rooms of the hotel
